duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate and go out to market for all lines of healthcare coverage for small to mid-market clients.
Serve as the communicator between the employees and carriers, managing reporting and programs/plans through Excel spreadsheets.
Collaborate with Sales Rep on the RFP process for potential clients, gathering information regarding carriers, benefit plans, and preparing presentations and proposals.
Evaluate plan utilization, track YOY changes, and manage the transition of fully insured clients to self-funded insurance programs.
Ensure understanding of ADA, COBRA, ACA, HIPPA, 5500 requirements, Section 125, and proficient use of Excel and carrier systems.
Accustomed to a client-facing role, excellent communicator with a servant heart.

education_certification.credential: Degree preferred, Group 1 License preferred but not required.
